mapper.select: select chat_no, room, send_nick, recv_nick, send_time, content, read_chk from CHAT where chat_no in (select max(chat_no) from CHAT group by room) and (send_nick = #{member_nick} or recv_nick=#{member_nick}) order by SEND_TIME ASC
select count(chat_no) from CHAT where recv_nick=#{member_nick} and read_chk=0 and room=#{room}

select c.chat_no, c.room, c.send_nick, c.recv_nick, c.send_time, c.content, c.read_chk, m.member_profile from CHAT c left outer join MEMBER m on c.recv_nick = m.member_nick
where room=#{room} and content is not null
where (recv_nick = #{recv_nick} and send_nick = #{member_nick}) or (send_nick = #{recv_nick} and recv_nick = #{member_nick})
order by send_time asc

choose.when: insert into CHAT( room, send_nick, recv_nick, send_time, content, read_chk ) values(#{room}, #{send_nick}, #{recv_nick}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i'), #{content}, 0)

mapper.select: select count(chat_no) from CHAT where (recv_nick = #{recv_nick} and send_nick=#{send_nick}) or (send_nick = #{recv_nick} and recv_nick=#{send_nick})
select room from CHAT where (recv_nick = #{recv_nick} and send_nick=#{send_nick}) or (send_nick = #{recv_nick} and recv_nick=#{send_nick}) LIMIT 0,1
